HotelElement.Name: Best Western Plus Le Canard sur le Toit

Description.Text: Best Western Plus Le Canard sur le Toit is a traditional 3-star superior property offering comfortable accommodation in Colomiers, west of Toulouse. Highlights include an outdoor swimming pool, fine dining and peaceful surroundings. The hotel sits in the quiet area of Colomiers, within easy reach of the airport. Regional places of interest include Toulouse city centre and the famous Basilica of St. Sernin. The hotel occupies an impressive 18th-century residence set on 4 hectares of picturesque grounds. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Standard rooms are decorated in a modern style. Amenities include a flat-screen cable TV, a work desk, air-conditioning and an en-suite bathroom. The restaurant serves exquisite French cuisine in an elegant dining room or on the Italian-style terrace. The hotel provides 24-hour reception.
